All Classes and Interfaces|All Packages

M

main - package main
The main package holds all of the classes that allow the game to be run and used by the user.
main(String[]) - Static method in class main.CommandLineUI
The main method to create and launch the game from the command line interface.
Monster - Class in main
This class implements a Monster which can be purchased by the player using the shop class adding the Monster to the player's squad.
Monster(String, int, int, int, int, String) - Constructor for class main.Monster
Creates a new Monster based on given parameters.
MonsterBuilder - Interface in main
This interface defines the functionality required for the Monster builder pattern to create a usable instance of the monster class for the user player and enemy players.
MonsterBuilderImpl - Class in main
This class implements the MonsterBuilder interface and is responsible for adding variables defined by MonsterCreator to the Monster currently being built and then building the Monster which can then be used throughout the game.
MonsterBuilderImpl() - Constructor for class main.MonsterBuilderImpl
 
MonsterCreator - Class in main
This class is used by other classes as a part of the builder design pattern for making new Monsters.
MonsterCreator() - Constructor for class main.MonsterCreator
Creates a MonsterCreator instance and initializes the MonsterBuilder and random number generator.
monsterShop() - Method in class main.CommandLineUI
Asks the user to input the Id of the monster they wish to buy.
